definition: gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
time of business/opening hours (of shop)/working time
time of going to work/the morning rush hour

sentences.english: It was tight. so ti lasted a long time .
sentences.chinese: 两队不分胜负，所以持续了很长一段时间。

sentences.english: The developmental time of each ramet was basically same.
sentences.chinese: 结缕草无性系各分株的发育时间基本相同。

sentences.english: All of them insisted on my staying with them a few days longer.
sentences.chinese: 他们所有的人都坚持要我再跟他们多呆几天时间。

sentences.english: How long would it take to assemble a team for a project like this?
sentences.chinese: 为这样一个计划调集一个小组的人需要多长时间？

sentences.english: However, dependence need not be long term.
sentences.chinese: 然而，依赖并不需要很长时间。

sentences.english: They spend long hours staring at the screen with few breaks.
sentences.chinese: 他们长时间地注视屏幕，几乎不休息。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情况下，把教育时间写进去是个好主意。

sentences.english: Wants efficient changeovers between products with minimum downtime.
sentences.chinese: 用最少时间进行产品间转换。

sentences.english: The garbage collection pause times are the most significant delays any threads encounter.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾收集停顿时间是任何线程遇到的最显著的延迟。

sentences.english: He beat the time of Warcraft are less and less time to Kazakhstan.
sentences.chinese: 他打魔兽的时间都少，没有那么多的时间哈。

sentences.english: He beat the time of Warcraft are less and less time to Kazakhstan.
sentences.chinese: 他打魔兽的时间都少，没有那么多的时间哈。

sentences.english: The amount of time you spend alone has little to do with being lonely.
sentences.chinese: 你大部分独自一人的时间想必和寂寞扯不上什么关系。

sentences.english: In this semi-successional fermentation, a prolonged period of high rate daily gas production was maintained.
sentences.chinese: 半连续补料能维持较长时间的较高日产气效率。

sentences.english: Transit vehicle routing problem with time intervals-constrained is considered.
sentences.chinese: 提出了具有时间窗的货物运输车辆路径问题。

sentences.english: The interviewer spends a lot of time answering your questions.
sentences.chinese: 面试官花大批时间答复你的问题。

sentences.english: Time is respected by not wasting it.
sentences.chinese: 不浪费时间是值得尊重的。

definition: one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
to shift to an earlier date/to do sth ahead of time/in advance
time-consuming/to take a period of (x amount of time)
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to delay/to hold up/to waste time/to interfere with
